text: Robert “Bob” Dugard (3 July 1942 – 5 August 2018) was an English motorcycle speedway rider and promoter. He was born Hove, East Sussex. Dugard rode with Eastbourne Eagles, Wimbledon Dons, and West Ham Hammers. He was the owner of Arlington Stadium. Dugard died on 5 August 2018 in Hove from lung cancer, aged 76.Eastbourne Eagles' Bob Dugard dies aged 76 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:English businesspeople Category:Sportspeople from Sussex Category:People from East Sussex
title: Robert Dugard
